      • setMode

        public void setMode(int mode,
           boolean animation)
        Set the select mode of this TimePicker.
        Parameters:
        mode - The select mode. Can be MODE_HOUR or MODE_MINUTE.
        animation - Indicate that should show animation when switch select mode or not.
